Time & Work: Ronald and Elan are working on an assignment. Ronald takes 6 hours to type 32 pages on a computer, while Elan takes 5 hours to type 40 pages. How much time will they take, working together on two different computers to type an assignment of 110 pages ?
A does a work in 10 days and B does the same work in 15 days. In how many days they together will do the same work ?
Worker A takes 8 hours to do a job.Worker B takes 10 hours to do the same job.How long should it take both A and B, working together but independently, to do the same job ?
Time & Distance: How many minutes does Aditya take to cover a distance of 400m,if he runs at a speed of 20 km/hr ?
A car moves at the speed of 80 km/hr. What is the speed of the car in metres per second ?
If a person walks 14 km/hr instead of 10 km/hr, he would have walked 20 km more. The actual distance travelled by him is ?
I walk a certain distance and ride back taking a total time of 37 minutes. I could walk both ways in 55 minutes. How long would it take me to ride both ways ?
Permutation & Combination: How many words can be formed by using all letters of the word 'BIHAR' ?
From a group of 7 men and 6 women , five persons are to be selected to form a committee so that at least 3 men are there on the committee. In how many ways can it be done ?
Out of 7 consonants and 4 vowels, how many words of 3 consonants and 2 vowels can be formed ?
